source.notes: Baseline is derived from OCR of cropped table regions; some values are inferred where OCR dropped digits.

assumptions: Source PDF summarizes two identical windows (W1 and W2); quantities below are per-window.
For frame members where OCR only reliably captured rough length, shoulder length is inferred as rough - 50mm (25mm tenon each end), matching the head/cill/jamb pattern.
Sash bottom rail quantity is inferred from 'W1x3, W2x3' (3 per window: 2 main sashes + 1 fanlight).
